response.raw:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
To enforce administration policies and rules governing students:

1. Clearly communicate expectations at the beginning of the year
2. Post rules visibly in the classroom
3. Be consistent in applying consequences
4. Use positive reinforcement for good behavior
5. Document rule violations and interventions
6. Collaborate with administrators on serious infractions
7. Involve parents/guardians when necessary
8. Model appropriate behavior yourself
9. Review and reinforce rules regularly
10. Use age-appropriate explanations of why rules are important
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
